ai-tha-ap32:1.4_0: like a seed in the ag.
ai-tha-ap32:2.4_0: for the sake of the Teacher, for the sake of compared to the Teacher.
ai-tha-ap32:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap32:4.1_0: With seven eons of the eon
ai-tha-ap32:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap32:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap32:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap32:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap32:10.3_0: Delighted five hundred things have been spoken;
ai-tha-ap32:11.1_0: The third sub-chapter on Subhūti is finished.
